txt.en: Many years ago, brave adventurers faced Thrâng, chieftain of the Ghâshfra in this very arena. Can you withstand the flames and defeat him?

Deep within the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu, Thrâng, the chieftain of the Ghâshfra, is ready to take on all comers who challenge his might.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when you leave the instance.</rgb>
Many years ago, brave adventurers faced Thrâng, chieftain of the Ghâshfra in this very arena. Can you withstand the flames and defeat him?
You have found yourself in Thrâng's arena.\n\nYou should defeat Thrâng!
You have emerged victorious from the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu, Thrâng and his Ghâshfra defeated by your hand. For your efforts, you will be rewarded!
